mapper.select: SELECT DRAMA_NAME, DRAMA_DATE, DRAMA_CHANNEL, DRAMA_GENRE, DRAMA_DIRECTOR, DRAMA_CONTENT, DRAMA_READCOUNT, DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE, DRAMA_MAIN_IMAGE, DRAMA_CONTENT_IMAGE, DRAMA_EPISODE, DRAMA_GRADE, RNUM FROM ( SELECT DRAMA_NAME, to_char(DRAMA_DATE,'yyyy') as DRAMA_DATE, DRAMA_CHANNEL, DRAMA_GENRE, DRAMA_DIRECTOR, DRAMA_CONTENT, DRAMA_READCOUNT, DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE, DRAMA_MAIN_IMAGE, DRAMA_CONTENT_IMAGE, DRAMA_EPISODE, DRAMA_GRADE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM DRAMA ORDER BY DRAMA_DATE DESC) ORDER BY RNUM ASC) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DRAMA( DRAMA_NO, DRAMA_NAME, DRAMA_DATE, DRAMA_CHANNEL, DRAMA_GENRE, DRAMA_DIRECTOR, DRAMA_CONTENT, DRAMA_READCOUNT, DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE, DRAMA_MAIN_IMAGE, DRAMA_CONTENT_IMAGE, DRAMA_EPISODE, DRAMA_GRADE, ) values ( SEQ_DRAMA_NO.NEXTVAL, #{DRAMA_NAME}, #{DRAMA_DATE}, #{DRAMA_CHANNEL}, #{DRAMA_GENRE}, #{DRAMA_DIRECTOR}, #{DRAMA_CONTENT}, 0, #{DRAMA_POSTER_IMAGE}, #{DRAMA_MAIN_IMAGE}, #{DRAMA_CONTENT_IMAGE}, #{DRAMA_EPISODE}, 0 );
